IfSelectedTheMediaWillBeDisplayedOnTheWh: If selected, the media will be displayed on the {0}What's New{1} and Community feed. Even if unselected, the media will be added to the community gallery.
Chooseyourthumbnail: Press the Pause button to choose your video thumbnail:

StartThePlayerIfYouWantToChooseANewThumb: Start the player if you want to choose a new thumbnail.
RestartThePlayerIfYouWantToChooseANewThu: Restart the player if you want to choose a new thumbnail.
